title: The Egyptian
description: In ancient Egypt, a poor orphan becomes a genial physician and is eventually appointed at the Pharaoh's court where he witnesses palace intrigues and learns dangerous royal secrets.

title: The Naked Jungle
description: The Leiningen South American cocoa plantation is threatened by a 2-mile-wide, 20-mile-long column of army ants.

title: It Should Happen to You
description: When a young woman with dreams of fame rents a billboard to advertise herself, her life changes overnight.

title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
description: In first-century Rome, Christian slave Demetrius is sent to fight in the gladiatorial arena and Emperor Caligula seeks Jesus' robe for its alleged magical powers.

title: Broken Lance
description: The saga of the Devereaux rancher family, set in 1880's Arizona.

title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
description: An American journalist returns to Paris - a city that gave him true love and deep grief.

title: Man with a Million
description: As part of a bet, two aristocrats offer a penniless American a loan, without telling him that the amount is £1,000,000 in the form of a single banknote.

title: Garden of Evil
description: A trio of American adventurers marooned in rural Mexico are recruited by a beautiful woman to rescue her husband trapped in a cave in Apache territory.

title: Salt of the Earth

title: Three Coins in the Fountain
description: Three American women working in Rome, Italy, share a spacious apartment and the desire to find love and marriage, each experiencing a few bumps in their journeys to romance.

title: A Lesson in Love
description: After a 15-year marriage, the spouses are going to divorce, but suddenly find out that their feelings have not vanished yet.

title: Lassie
description: The ongoing saga of the Martin family and their beloved collie, Lassie.

title: Pushover
description: An undercover police officer falls for the beautiful moll of a bank robber on the run, and together they plan to double-cross the hood and the cops.

title: Witness to Murder
description: A woman's sanity comes into question, after she claims to have witnessed a murder from her apartment window.

title: Désirée
description: The rise and fall of Napoleon Bonaparte, Emperor of France.

title: Black Widow
description: A young writer insinuates herself into the life of a Broadway producer.

title: Jail Bait
description: Vic Brady draws young Don Gregor into a life of crime. He then blackmails Gregor's plastic surgeon father into fixing up his face so he can evade the cops.

title: The Belles of St. Trinian's
description: The schoolgirls of St. Trinian's are more interested in racing forms than books as they try to get-rich-quick. They are abetted by the headmistress' brother.

title: Prince Valiant
description: A young Viking prince strives to become a knight in King Arthur's Court and restore his exiled father to his rightful throne.

title: Twenty-Four Eyes
description: Schoolteacher Hisako Oishi forms an emotional bond with her pupils and teaches them various virtues, while at the same time worrying about their future.

title: Young at Heart
description: The lives and romances of three sisters in a musical family; the youngest daughter's life is complicated by the subsequent arrival of a charming composer and a cynical music arranger.

title: Elephant Walk
description: The young bride of a rich planter finds herself the only white woman at Elephant Walk tea plantation, British Ceylon.

title: Father Knows Best
description: The popular radio show comes to life in this hit sitcom about a wise family man, Jim Anderson, his common-sense wife Margaret and their children Betty, Bud and Kathy.

title: Killers from Space
description: An atomic scientist claims he was abducted by aliens after being injured in a plane crash.

title: Track of the Cat
description: Around the turn of the 20th century, during a harsh northern California winter, members of a ranching family are squabbling among themselves while the two oldest sons go hunting for a panther that is killing their livestock.

title: The Purple Plain
description: In WW2 Burma, a Canadian bomber pilot becomes reckless after losing his bride in a Luftwaffe air-raid.

title: Riot in Cell Block 11
description: Fed up with the inhumane prison living conditions, a general prison riot breaks out, leading to hostage-taking, a stand-off with the guards and eventual negotiations with the prison administration officials.

title: Silver Lode
description: In Silver Lode, Dan Ballard is arrested by 4 Marshals for murder and theft but he denies the charges and searches for the real culprit even as the townsfolk start abandoning him.

title: The Magical World of Disney
description: A Disney-produced anthology covering many different genres.

title: Inauguration of the Pleasure Dome
description: Historical, biblical, and mythical characters gather in the pleasure dome and become part of a visual feast of superimposed images, hallucinations, and decadence.
star: Samson De Brier,Marjorie Cameron,Joan Whitney,Katy Kadell

title: Hell and High Water
description: During the Cold War, a scientific team refits a Japanese submarine and hires an ex-Navy officer to find a secret Chinese atomic island base and prevent a Communist plot against America that could trigger WW3.

title: Sound of the Mountain
description: An ingratiating bride develops warm ties to her father-in-law while her cold husband blithely slights her for another woman.

title: Susan Slept Here
description: A Hollywood screenwriter takes in a runaway girl who's more woman than he can handle.

title: Miseria e nobiltà
description: "Miseria e Nobiltà" tells the story of the humble families of Felice Pasquale and his colleague who are hired by a Marquis who wants to marry the daughter of a rich but simple cook, so they pose as aristocrats.

title: The Gold of Naples
description: A portrait of the people, the defects, and the peculiarities of Naples in six different vignettes.

title: The Mad Magician
description: Don Gallico is a master at devising magicians' illusions and tries to establish his own stage show as Gallico the Great. His performance is interrupted mid-show by his employer Ross Ormond ... See full summary »

title: The Black Shield of Falworth
description: Peasant Myles Falworth is trained for knighthood and is groomed by various nobles to defeat the evil Earl of Alban who's plotting to usurp King Henry IV's throne.

title: An American in Rome
description: Nando Moriconi is a young Italian living in Rome. He is fond for everything coming from the United States. He tries to speak American-English, to wear clothes he thinks Americans wear, to ... See full summary »
star: Alberto Sordi,Maria Pia Casilio,Ilse Peterson,Anita Durante

title: Drive a Crooked Road
description: An upright car mechanic falls in love with the girlfriend of a gangster. This forces him to participate in the criminal underworld.

title: Bugs and Thugs
description: When Bugs calls a cab he doesn't know it's the getaway car for a couple of bankrobbers (he does know the capital of Nevada).

title: Phffft
description: While pursing new companions, a former married couple keep running into one another all over town.

title: The Silver Chalice
description: Paul Newman - in his screen debut - plays a 1st-century Greek sculptor who is sold into slavery.

title: Living It Up
description: An unsophisticated stationmaster from provincial New Mexico fraudulently claims that he is dying in order to get an expense-paid dream tour of New York.

title: Secret of the Incas
description: An adventurer searchers for hidden treasure in the Peruvian jungles.

title: Devil May Hare
description: Bugs Bunny finds the Tasmanian Devil in his encyclopedia just as the animal threatens to devour him.

title: Devil Girl from Mars
description: An uptight, leather-clad female alien, armed with a ray gun and accompanied by a menacing robot, comes to Earth to collect Earth's men as breeding stock.

title: Private Hell 36
description: When 2 detectives steal $80,000 from a dead robber, one of them suffers from a guilty conscience which could lead to murder.

title: Illusion Travels by Streetcar
description: Confronted with the unfortunate news that their favorite Streetcar, no. 133, is going to be decommissioned, two Municipal Transit workers get drunk and decide to "take 'er for one last spin".

description: Irene Wagner, the wife of prominent scientist Albert Wagner, finds herself blackmailed about her affair by her lover's jealous ex-girlfriend. The plot, an experiment in causing fear, drives her into a rage.

description: In 1796, Captain George Bryan "Beau" Brummell of the 10th Royal Hussars Regiment offends the Prince of Wales with his straightforward outspokenness and gets fired from the Army but is chosen as the Prince's personal advisor.

title: Shield for Murder
description: When a brutal police detective Lt. murders a bookmaker's runner for $25,000 in cash, a deaf mute sees him do it and now he finds he must kill again to cover his tracks.

title: Doctor in the House
description: The trials and tribulations of a group of medical students at St. Swithin's hospital in London, England.

title: Destry
description: A dishonest mayor and powerful criminal dominate a small western town. But when the town's sheriff dies under mysterious circumstances, Tom Destry, son of a famed gunman, is called in to put an end to the corruption.

title: The Detective
description: Works of art are disappearing, stolen by a master thief, a master of disguise. Father Brown has two goals: to catch the thief and to save his soul.

title: Valley of the Kings
description: In 1900, in Egypt, archaeologist Mark Brandon is asked by Ann Mercedes to find the tomb of Ra-Hotep but their quest is marred by intrigue, betrayal, murder and danger.

title: Gog
description: A security agent investigates sabotage and murder at a secret underground laboratory, home of two experimental robots.

title: Green Fire
description: In Colombia, mining engineer Rian Mitchell discovers Carrero, the lost emerald mine of the Conquistadors, but has to contend with notorious local bandit El Moro's gang and with coffee planter Catherine Knowland's love.

title: Peter Pan
description: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: Roman Holiday
description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: Tokyo Story
description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

title: The Wages of Fear
description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.
star: Yves Montand,Charles Vanel,Peter van Eyck,Folco Lulli

title: Stalag 17
description: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

title: From Here to Eternity
description: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his commanding officer's wife and top aide begin a tentative affair.

description: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.
star: Alan Ladd,Jean Arthur,Van Heflin,Brandon De Wilde

title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
description: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

title: The War of the Worlds
description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

title: The Big Heat
description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

title: Ugetsu
description: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

title: How to Marry a Millionaire
description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

title: I Confess
description: A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

title: Monsieur Hulot's Holiday
description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation and accidentally, but good-naturedly, causes havoc.

title: I Vitelloni
description: A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.

title: House of Wax
description: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

title: Niagara
description: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

title: The Wild One
description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

title: Pickup on South Street
description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

title: Summer with Monika
description: A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.

title: Fear and Desire
description: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.

title: Julius Caesar
description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

title: The Band Wagon
description: A pretentiously artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.

title: The Naked Spur
description: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two less-than-trustworthy strangers.

title: Hondo
description: Army dispatch rider Hondo Lane discovers a woman and young son living in the midst of warring Apaches and becomes their protector.

title: The Robe
description: In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.

title: Calamity Jane
description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.
star: Doris Day,Howard Keel,Allyn Ann McLerie,Philip Carey

title: The Earrings of Madame De...
description: When an aristocratic woman known only as "Madame de . . ." sells a pair of earrings given to her by her husband in order to pay some debts, she sets off a chain reaction of financial and carnal consequences that can end only in despair.

title: It Came from Outer Space
description: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

title: Beat the Devil
description: On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple. They meet and things happen...

title: The Hitch-Hiker
description: Two fishermen pick up a psychopathic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.

title: Duck Amuck
description: The short-tempered Daffy Duck must improvise madly as the backgrounds, his costumes, the soundtrack, even his physical form, shifts and changes at the whim of the animator.

title: Glen or Glenda
description: A psychiatrist tells the stories of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda) and a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).
star: Edward D. Wood Jr.,Bela Lugosi,Lyle Talbot,Timothy Farrell

title: Mogambo
description: On a Kenyan safari, white hunter Victor Marswell has a love triangle with seductive American socialite Eloise Kelly and anthropologist Donald Nordley's cheating wife Linda.

title: Angel Face
description: Ambulance driver Frank Jessup is ensnared in the schemes of the sensuous but dangerous Diane Tremayne.

title: Invaders from Mars
description: A young boy learns that space aliens are taking over the minds of earthlings.

title: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
description: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and, ultimately, New York City.

title: Titanic
description: An unhappily married couple struggle to deal with their problems while on board the luxurious, ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: Sawdust and Tinsel
description: The complicated relationships between a circus ringmaster, his estranged wife and his lover.

title: Kiss Me Kate
description: An ex-husband and wife team star in a musical version of 'The Taming of the Shrew'; off-stage, the production is troublesome with ex-lovers' quarrels and two gangsters looking for some money owed to them.

title: Duck Dodgers in the 24½th Century
description: Duck Dodgers and Marvin Martian wage war over Planet X.

title: El
description: A husband's suave exterior unravels after his marriage, and he unleashes his paranoid and volatile temper on his wife, which escalates to more dangerous and unpredictable tantrums.
star: Arturo de Córdova,Delia Garcés,Aurora Walker,Carlos Martínez Baena

title: The Blue Gardenia
description: A telephone operator ends up drunk and at the mercy of a cad in his apartment. The next morning she wakes up with a hangover and the terrible fear she may be a murderess.

title: Robot Monster
description: The monstrous Ro-Man attempts to annihilate the last family alive on Earth, but finds himself falling for their beautiful daughter.

title: The Desert Rats
description: Richard Burton plays a Scottish Army officer put in charge of a disparate band of ANZAC troops on the perimeter of Tobruk with the German Army doing their best to dislodge them.

title: The Cruel Sea
description: The World War II adventures of a British convoy escort ship and its officers.

title: Abbott and Costello Meet Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description: Two bumbling American cops hunt for the mysterious Mr. Hyde in London, England.

title: Welcome Mr. Marshall!
description: After finding out that North American people are visiting the Spanish villages, the citizens of Villar del Río start preparing themselves to welcome them when they arrive.

title: The 5, 000 Fingers of Dr. T.

title: Crime Wave
description: Reformed parolee Steve Lacey is caught in the middle when a wounded former cellmate seeks him out for shelter.
star: Gene Nelson,Sterling Hayden,Phyllis Kirk,Ted de Corsia

title: The Bigamist
description: A man secretly married to two women feels the pressure of his deceit.

title: Gate of Hell
description: A samurai pursues a married lady-in-waiting.

title: Knights of the Round Table
description: King Arthur's rule is threatened by the adulterous love between Sir Lancelot and Queen Guinevere, a relationship the king's enemies hope to exploit.

title: Lili
description: An orphaned young woman becomes part of a puppet act and forms a relationship with the anti-social puppeteer.
star: Leslie Caron,Mel Ferrer,Jean-Pierre Aumont,Zsa Zsa Gabor

title: Island in the Sky
description: A C-47 transport plane, named the Corsair, makes a forced landing in the frozen wastes of Quebec, and the plane's pilot, Captain Dooley, must keep his men alive in deadly conditions while waiting for rescue.

title: Houdini
description: From his beginnings as a "wildman" carnival act to the internationally famous feat of escaping from a locked trunk in an ice-jammed river, the great Harry Houdini emerged as the world's most captivating magician and escape artist.

title: Duck! Rabbit, Duck!
description: The final installment of the "Hunting Trilogy" once again has Elmer out hunting, while Bugs and Daffy try to con him into shooting the other.

title: Abbott and Costello Go to Mars
description: Two workmen accidentally launch a space rocket intended for Mars, and find mistakenly landing in New Orleans just the beginning of their misadventures.

title: Genevieve
description: Two British couples pit their vintage automobiles against each other in an exciting cross-country race.

title: 99 River Street
description: A former boxer turned cab driver has to hide from the police when his badgering wife is murdered by the jewel thief she was having an affair with.

title: The Titfield Thunderbolt
description: Volunteers take over their local passenger train service (against bus company resistance) when the government announces its closure.

title: Indiscretion of an American Wife
description: Prior to leaving by train for Paris, a married American woman tries to break off her affair with a young Italian in Rome's Stazione Termini.

title: The Seafarers
description: Stanley Kubrick's first film made in color, lost for over forty years. The documentary extols the benefits of membership to the Seafarers International Union.

title: Little Fugitive
description: A young boy fears that he shot his older brother, who is only faking. He then runs away to Coney Island, a crowded beach area, and gets money by returning soda bottles for their deposits.

title: Escape from Fort Bravo
description: During the Civil War, a group of Confederates escapes from the Union POW camp at Fort Bravo but has to contend with the desert, the Mescalero Apaches and the pursuing Union troops.

title: Bully for Bugs
description: Bugs Bunny takes a wrong turn at Albuquerque and winds up in a Mexican bullring fighting one heck of a big bullying bull.

title: The Return of Don Camillo
description: Energetic priest Don Camillo returns to the town of Brescello for more political and personal duels with Communist mayor Peppone.

title: The Moon Is Blue
description: Two aging playboys are both after the same attractive young woman, but she fends them off by claiming that she plans to remain a virgin until her wedding night. Both men determine to find a way around her objections.

title: By the Light of the Silvery Moon

title: The Caddy
description: Although gifted golfer Harvey Miller is too nervous to golf in public tournaments, he acts as coach and caddy for friend Joe Anthony.

title: White Mane
description: In the Camargue, France, a young boy bonds with a white haired horse that escaped from ranchers.

title: The Man Between
description: In post-WW2 Berlin, when travel to the East was still possible, the sister of a British officer from West Berlin is abducted by Communist agents and taken into the Soviet sector where her eventual rescue is arranged by a German smuggler.

title: A Geisha
description: A seasoned geisha and her apprentice maiko are forced to give in to their clients' sexual advances to survive.

title: Jeopardy
description: A family vacationing on the coast of Mexico have to cope with multiple threats to their safety.

title: Dangerous Crossing
description: When a beautiful bride boards an ocean liner with her new husband, he goes into hiding, and she becomes the target of a murder conspiracy.

title: Do Bigha Zamin
description: In the hope of earning enough money to pay off his debts and save his land, a poor farmer becomes a rickshaw puller in the Calcutta and faces many difficulties.

title: El bruto
description: A tough young man, who helps to kick poor people out of their houses, falls in love with a girl. She lives with her father in the building about to be demolished.

title: The Tell-Tale Heart
description: A madman tells his tale of murder, and how a strange beating sound haunted him afterward.

title: Dream Wife
description: A business tycoon decides to wed a Middle Eastern princess whose customs dictate the pair must live apart for several months before marrying. Even more complications settle in when the tycoon's ex-fiancée is assigned to chaperone the pair.
star: Cary Grant,Deborah Kerr,Walter Pidgeon,Betta St. John

title: All I Desire
description: In 1910, a wayward mother re-visits the family she deserted.

title: The Man from the Alamo
description: During the Alamo siege, John Stroud is sent to Ox Bow to protect the townsfolk but, following a massacre, he infiltrates Jess Wade's gang of turncoat renegades supporting the Mexicans.

title: Scared Stiff
description: Fleeing a murder charge, a busboy and a nightclub singer wind up on a spooky Caribbean island inherited by a young woman.

title: Salome
description: After her banishment from Rome, Jewish Princess Salome returns to her Roman-ruled native land of Galilee, where prophet John the Baptist preaches against Salome's parents, King Herod and Queen Herodias.

title: Trouble Along the Way
description: An ex-football coach is hired by a small Catholic college to train its football team in the hopes of winning games and making money to save the school from bankruptcy.

title: Thunder Bay
description: Shrimpers and oilmen clash after an ambitious wildcatter begins constructing an off-shore oil rig.

title: Cat-Women of the Moon
description: Astronauts travel to the moon where they discover it is inhabited by attractive young women in black tights.

title: The Lady Without Camelias
description: A new starlet is discovered and has ups and downs in Italian films.

title: Malta Story
description: 1942 and the island of Malta is battling for survival. The threat of invasion by Axis forces is increasing as air raids wear down its defence. Entering this maelstrom is Flight Lieutenant Peter Ross, an RAF photo-reconnaissance pilot.

title: Bread, Love and Dreams
description: When a veteran marshal is sent to a small town, he quickly falls for two women: a midwife and an earthy young woman nicknamed "Frisky".
star: Vittorio De Sica,Gina Lollobrigida,Marisa Merlini,Virgilio Riento

title: The Captain's Paradise
description: The captain of a ferry boat between the restricted British colony in Gibraltar and Spanish Morocco has a woman of differing appeal and temperament in each port.

title: Mesa of Lost Women
description: A mad scientist named Arana is creating giant spiders and dwarfs in his lab on Zarpa Mesa in Mexico. He wants to create a master race of superwomen by injecting his female subjects with spider venom.

title: Eaux d'artifice
description: A man dressed in an elegant period dress wanders through the water gardens at the Villa d'Este.

title: Man in the Attic
description: After an enigmatic, self-described pathologist rents the attic room of a Victorian house, his landlady begins to suspect her lodger is Jack the Ripper.

title: Split Second
description: Two escaped killers take hostages and hide in a Nevada mining ghost town knowing that an atom bomb is scheduled to be tested there the next morning.

title: The Master of Ballantrae
description: Two noble Scottish brothers deliberately take opposite sides when Bonnie Prince Charlie returns to claim the throne of Scotland in order to preserve the family fortune.

title: A Blueprint for Murder
description: Whitney Cameron suspects his sister-in-law has poisoned his brother and niece, but without proof how does he prevent the murder of his nephew?

title: The Adultress
description: A truck driver kills the husband of the woman he loves, and becomes the object of blackmail.
star: Simone Signoret,Raf Vallone,Jacques Duby,Maria Pia Casilio

title: Young Bess
description: The early life of Elizabeth I, from her childhood until her accession to the throne of England in 1558.

title: The Sun Shines Bright
description: John Ford weaves three "Judge Priest" stories together to form a good-natured exploration of honour and small-town politics in the South around the turn of the century. Judge William Priest... See full summary »

title: Battle Circus
description: Set in Korea and made during the war, this is the love story of a hard-bitten Army surgeon, and a new nurse ready to save the world.

title: Singin' in the Rain
description: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

title: High Noon
description: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up years ago, arrives on the noon train.

title: Ikiru
description: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

title: The Quiet Man

description: The caped crusaders versus The Wizard, black-hooded mastermind.

title: The Little Orphan
description: The Bide-a-Wee Mouse Home has sent the orphan mouse, Nibbles, to spend Thanksgiving with Jerry. But Jerry's cupboard is bare, and Nibbles is always hungry. They start by raiding Tom's milk ... See full summary »

title: The Woman in White
description: A young painter stumbles upon an assortment of odd characters at an English estate where he has been hired to give art lessons to beautiful Laura Fairlie. Among them are Anne Catherick, a ... See full summary »

description: A chorus girl falls in love with a wealthy young man, but their relationship is jeopardized by her mother's fears about the reaction of his family.

description: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, with screwball results.

description: A clumsy daydreamer gets caught up in a sinister conspiracy.

description: Two homeless men move into a mansion while its owners are wintering in the South.

title: Secret Beyond the Door...
description: When a lovely woman and her new husband settle in an ancient mansion on the East coast, she discovers that he may want to kill her.

title: Body and Soul
description: A talented boxer's young career hits difficult terrain when an unethical promoter takes interest in him.

title: Boomerang!
description: The true story of a prosecutor's fight to prove the innocence of a man accused of a notorious murder.

title: The Cat Concerto
description: Tom Cat is a concert pianist who plays beautifully until he is interrupted by Jerry Mouse.

title: The Two Mrs. Carrolls
description: An artist forms an attachment with a woman on holiday in the country. As the relationship develops, his behavior and information about his past cause her increasing concern.

title: The Red House
description: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

title: Mickey and the Beanstalk
description: A mysterious thief has stolen the prosperous Happy Valley's most prized possession: the musical Singing Harp. Can Mickey, Donald, and Goofy find the answer in the irritable Willie the Giant's magnificent castle up in the blue sky?

title: Lured
description: British police are after a serial killer who lures his female victims through newspaper personal ads and sends cryptic-poem clues to the cops.

title: T-Men
description: Two US Treasury agents hunt a successful counterfeiting ring.

title: A Double Life

title: My Favorite Brunette

title: Pursued

description: During a Sunday trip into war-ravaged Tokyo, despairing Yuzo and optimistic Masako look for work and lodging, as well as affordable entertainments to pass the time.

description: A depiction of life in wartime England during the Second World War. Director Humphrey Jennings visits many aspects of civilian life and of the turmoil and privation caused by the war, all without narration.
director: Humphrey Jennings visits many aspects of civilian life and of the turmoil and privation caused by the war, all without narration.

description: The Man of Steel fights a mad scientist who is destroying Metropolis with an energy cannon.

description: In order to please his dying father, a man convinces a hat-check girl to impersonate his fiancée, but complications arise when the father's health suddenly improves.

description: A respected investment advisor has a double life as a mystery writer and becomes involved in the real murder of a shady client.

title: Chef Donald
description: Donald is listening to a radio cooking program while mixing up a batch of waffles. But he's distracted and uses rubber cement instead of baking powder.

description: Two young men head west in search of fortune and adventure.

description: Sisters Kay and Barbara arrive in Miami from Texas looking for rich husbands.

title: Rebecca

title: Night Train to Munich

title: Gaslight

description: The owner of a coal mining operation, falsely imprisoned for fratricide, takes a drug to make him invisible, despite its side effect: gradual madness.

title: Road to Singapore
description: Two playboys try to forget previous romances in Singapore - until they meet a beautiful dancer.

title: The Eternal Jew

title: Kitty Foyle
description: A hard-working, white-collar girl from a middle-class family meets and falls in love with a young socialite, but she soon clashes with his family.

title: The Ghost Breakers
description: A radio broadcaster, his quaking manservant and an heiress investigate the mystery of a haunted castle in Cuba.

description: Two buddies who rise from fly-by-night wildcatters to oil tycoons over a twenty year period both love the same woman.

title: I Love You Again
description: Boring businessman Larry Wilson recovers from amnesia and discovers he's really a con man...and loves his soon-to-be-ex wife.

title: The Return of Frank James
description: Frank James continues to avoid arrest in order to take revenge on the Ford brothers for their murder of his brother Jesse.

title: Jud Süß
description: Infamous anti-Semitic Nazi propaganda historical drama about Duke Karl Alexander of Württemberg and his treasurer Süß Oppenheimer.

title: The Devil Bat
description: A mad scientist develops an aftershave lotion that causes his gigantic bats to kill anyone who wears it.

title: My Little Chickadee
description: After a scandal runs a gold-digger out of town, she meets a con artist and becomes embroiled in a string of petty deceits.

title: The Invisible Woman

title: Dr. Cyclops

description: Susan Trexel is a wealthy socialite, who while vacationing in Europe undergoes a religious transformation. On her return to America, Susan takes on the task of spreading her new found ... See full summary »

description: During the 1860s Tucson, a pioneer woman struggles to succeed in the freight and cattle business while at risk at the hands of corrupt and violent local businessmen and rampaging Indians.

title: You're Missing the Point
description: The boyfriend (Cantinflas) of the servant of a rich industrial man, gets into the house in order to kill a mad dog. Suddenly this man appears so the servant tells him that Cantinflas is his... See full summary »

description: When Charlie's old friend from Scotland Yard is murdered when they attend a police convention in New York, Chan picks up the case he was working on.

description: Early in World War II, Danish sea captain Andersen, delayed in a British port, tangles with German spies.
